--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She watched the baby bot suck down the energon in the bottle. She 
> looked around hoping to find another one, but couldn't see it 
while 
> standing there with the baby. She looked at the infant,"You know, 
if 
> your a baby bot, that makes me a big bot now. So you know what? 
I'm 
> going to have to take care of you untill your mommy and daddy get 
> home. I just hope it's soon. Your bottle is almost empty."
